  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> - This class can be derived from and used by targets to hold private target-specific information for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Public Member Functions

### clone() {#a4e4c9f1b400c8093626e45555b9299cd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineFunctionInfo &#42; llvm::CSKYMachineFunctionInfo::clone (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; DestMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Src2DstMBB) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Make a functionally equivalent copy of this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> in <code>MF</code>.

This requires remapping <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> references from the original parent to values in the new function. Targets may assume that virtual register and frame index values are preserved in the new function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskymachinefunctioninfo-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/csky/cskymachinefunctioninfo-h">CSKYMachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
